name: SMUGhana
short_description:
The description of my application: It contain four pages, the first page has the username and password, the second page allowed you to call SMU care and fire service. Third page contain to visit my school website, to call police, to call even my number and watch online footballs And the last page which contain to call ambulance, to download e-books, to call SMU VC, to watch C++ tutorials, to upload IA question and  to browse on internet.
All this Application that I have done was developed with the help of Android developer tools (ECLIPES). I designed, developed and create Android Application for our students with the little idea I had on Android Application development. My application is clearly solve the entire problems for the student SMU. It help the student to visited a school website directly and download some important application pertaining a study.It help the student to download E-BOOKS without going to library or class.It also help a student to download past question papers.
summary: SMU_GHANA which is very important for the Sikkim Manipal University
